opennlp.ccg.realize.hypertagger
Class ZLMaxentHypertagger

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.realize.hypertagger.TagExtractor
      opennlp.ccg.realize.hypertagger.ZLMaxentHypertagger
All Implemented Interfaces:
SupertaggerAdapter, Hypertagger
public class ZLMaxentHypertagger
extends TagExtractor
implements Hypertagger

Author:
espinosa This class implements the hypertagger. Instantiating a hypertagger requires several external files:
  1. A POS model
  2. A prior model for POS tags, and its vocab file
  3. A prior model for hypertags, and its vocab file
The prior model files are optional.

To use the hypertagger for realization, instantiate a POS tagger first, then instantiate the hypertagger using that POS tagger. Example in pseudo-code: POSPriorModel ppm = new POSPriorModel(String flmFile, String vocabFile); ZLMaxentModel posMod = new ZLMaxentModel(String fileName); ZLPOSTagger pt = new ZLPOSTagger(posMod, ppm); ZLMaxentHypertagger ht = new ZLMaxentHypertagger(pt, File htModelPath); ht.loadPriorModel(File priorModelFile, File vocabFile); The tagger can also be instantiated from a config file. This is the recommended method for using the tagger as part of the realizer. See the method 'ZLMaxentHypertaggerFactory'.

ZLMaxentHypertagger

public ZLMaxentHypertagger(File posModelFile,
                           File hyperModelFile)
                    throws IOException
This constructor loads both a POS-tagging model and a hypertagging model.

Parameters:
posModelFile - The filename from which to load the POS-tagging model. If null, gold-stardard POS tags will be used (and must be stored via storeGoldStdPredInfo()).
hyperModelFile - The filename from which to load the hypertagging model
Throws:
IOException - If any model fails to load.

ZLMaxentHypertagger

public ZLMaxentHypertagger(File posModelFile)
                    throws IOException
This constructor loads only a POS-tagging model. It's useful for extracting features for Maxent training.

Parameters:
posModelFile - The filename from which to load the model.
Throws:
IOException - If the model couldn't be loaded for any reason.

storeGoldStdPredInfo

public void storeGoldStdPredInfo(String predInfo)
Description copied from interface: Hypertagger
Stores the gold standard pred info, for use in discriminative training. The string consists of space delimited tokens, where each token is a colon-separated list of fields, with the first field containing the nominal id, and the second field the gold supertag.

Specified by:
storeGoldStdPredInfo in interface Hypertagger
Specified by:
storeGoldStdPredInfo in class TagExtractor
